articles.description: The city of Pasadena was forced to cancel a vaccination clinic for Thursday after hundreds of ineligible people got their hands on a link that allowed them to register for one of the slots.
articles.content: PASADENA, Calif. (KABC) -- The city of Pasadena was forced to cancel a vaccination clinic for Thursday after hundreds of ineligible people got their hands on a link that allowed them to register for … [+2469 chars]

articles.author: Louisa Richards
articles.title: Can veganism really lower a person's COVID-19 risk? - Medical News Today
articles.description: A plant-based or vegan diet cannot prevent people from developing COVID-19. They may, however, help support the immune system and aid in prevention. Learn more.
articles.content: A vegan or plant-based diet cannot prevent a person from developing COVID-19, but it may help support a healthy immune system. This in turn could aid in SARS-CoV-2 infection prevention and lower the … [+9147 chars]

articles.author: Denise Grady
articles.title: Lung Cancer Scans Are Recommended for People 50 and Older With Shorter Smoking Histories - The New York Times
articles.description: New advice from an influential panel will make more women and African-Americans eligible for CT scans, but some who need them most may not be able to afford them.
